Text:
awesome album!!!
one of my all time favourites...
brilliant music, even better storyline...
who did kill Mary? Nikki? Dr X? suicide?
listen sand decide for yourself...

Did Mary get killed?  I thought that was a maybe...

Just checking it now, haven't listened to this in like 10 years.  Thanks for uploading it!

Thanks for the up raidy!
This album rocks!
One of my favorite albums of all time!
Great memories!
Much appreciated m8!
